## âœ… Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have run `npm test` and all tests pass
- [ ] Test coverage remains at or above 80%

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new/modified functions
- [ ] I have updated examples if the API changed

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not added new dependencies without discussion
- [ ] If new dependencies were added, I have explained why they are necessary
- [ ] All dependencies are compatible with Node.js >= 18.0.0

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] This PR does not introduce breaking changes
- [ ] If it does, I have listed all breaking changes below
- [ ] I have updated the version number appropriately (major.minor.patch)

### Git

- [ ] My commits follow the conventional commits format
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest main/develop
- [ ] I have resolved all merge conflicts
